FOUND IN: High-fashion trailblazer (also known as an "haute couturier" or "haute couteur")
Pampas: Wide, fertile lowlands found in Argentina, Uruguay, and southern Brazil that are characterized by tall grasses and short trees.

FOUND IN: Golan Heights: A strategic plateau north of Israel, captured from Syria in 1967, which has been annexed by Israel but is internationally unrecognized as such.
